description:
Yoshihiko decides to go shopping alone - and he`s run over by a beautiful woman in a Santa dress! Everyone but Yoshihiko would have recognized her as the famous idol Morio Junna; as to escape the crowd immediately formed about these two, "Mori-Jun" addresses Yoshihiko as her manager and drags him away with her.
Mori-Jun can`t believe the boy never heard of her before. They grab a bite at a fast-food restaurant, but then one of Mori-Jun`s commercials is shown there on the screen. Mori-Jun asks Yoshihiko to accompany her but he`s still unimpressed about "dating an idol". Then Mori-Jun runs away with Yoshihiko`s jacket.
